name: The Casino Empire
description:
"The Casino Empire" is an exciting game that puts you in charge of building your own Las Vegas-style casino empire.

Starting from scratch, you'll manage a few gambling tables to attract players and earn money.

As you collect more funds, you'll be able to reinvest in your casino and create new attractions. With each successful investment, you'll attract more customers and grow your reputation as a casino mogul.As your casino empire grows, you'll need to hire staff to help you manage your business.

Can you build a successful casino empire and become the ultimate gambling tycoon? Play "The Casino Empire" and find out!

Game Features :
- Reinvesting money
- Unlimited time
- Building the new Vegas
